name: Aiming Handgun At Viewer
description:
Aiming Handgun At Viewer [LoRA]

Like what I do? Consider following my work on twitter

Link to the model used on the display generations (recommended).

(If you use other anime model with it, let me know the results in the comments!)

That's the first version (also my first LoRA) so expect failures sometimes. I recommend using prompts/generation parameters like I used on the LoRA's showcase images.

Don't forget to use the trigger words aiming at viewer

Don't know how to use or install LoRAs?
Check my article on that matter.

meta.prompt: 1girl, grey eyes , long aqua hair , aiming at viewer, holding pistol, handgun, masterpiece, detailed shadows, detailed light, highly detailed, best quality, HD, 4K, high quality, <lora:LoraGoth-10:1>
